title: Quiz 4 - Direction Sense
instruction: Directions (21-25): Study the following information carefully and answer the below questions. X@Y(12m): X is 17m north of Y X#Y(13m): X is 7m south of Y X$Y(13m): X is 21m east of Y X%Y(20m): X is 13m west of Y X&YC: X is middle of Y and C Note: X#$Y means X is southeast of Y   M@N(7); O#P(12); O$N(9); P%R(14); Q#R(19); Q$S(11)
